title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. I, pt. 5 - Drinking Water Supplies
content:

State Regulations

Subpart 5-1 - Public Water Systems

Subpart 5-2 - Water Well Construction (§ 5-2.1 to 5-2.14)

Subpart 5-3 - Repealed

Subpart 5-4 - Classification And Certification Of Community And Nontransient Noncommunity Water System Operators (§ 5-4.1 to 5-4.9)

Subpart 5-5 - Water Quality Treatment Districts (§ 5-5.1 to 5-5.7)

Subpart 5-6 - Bottled And Bulk Water Standards (§ 5-6.1 to 5-6.18)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. I, pt. 5

Statutory authority: Public Health Law, §§201, 225, 1150, 1151

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
